Posts.Content: I have noticed over the past week and a half my right breast... the sink became very dry and kind of red.. and part of it is extremely dry and sore. Close to the center is like a very dry blister where in hurts. I'm scared it might be something serious.. but then I wonder if it's just a really bad case of very dry winter skin? Please, Any help or advice will be greatly appreciated because I just don't want to have to spend the money to go to a doctor just yet because I'm a college student and I can't afford to just go and get a mammogramor go see my doctor for that matter. Thank you so much! --Rachel--
Posts.Title: Large red sore and bump

Posts.Content: I still haven't gotten a chance to go to the doctor... but I think it was maybe like an infected pimple if there is such a thing or something like that cause... the blistery part popped and puss came out.. and the reddness has been going away.. it's still dryed a little but not bad at all.. It looks a lot better. It definately feels tons better. Should I still get it checked out? cause it's not really a lump anymore. Just a pinkish red spot.
Posts.Title: Large red sore and bump

Posts.Content: It looks much better now.. The skin is not so dry and it's turned into more of a scab. I still haven't made it to the doctor, but I'm not sure if I'll make it. But thanks everyone for the input.
